greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: McKay-Thompson series of class 18A for the Monster group.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = -1..1000
D. Ford, J. McKay and S. P. Norton, More on replicable functions, Commun. Algebra 22, No. 13, 5175-5193 (1994).
Index entries for McKay-Thompson series for Monster simple group
formula: Expansion of F - 2/F, where F = q^(1/3) * eta(q^2) * eta(q^3)^3 / (eta(q) * eta(q^6)^3), in powers of q. - _G. C. Greubel_, May 28 2018
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ 1 + 1/q QPochhammer[ q] QPochhammer[ q^2] / (QPochhammer[ q^9] QPochhammer[ q^18]), {q, 0, n}]; (* _Michael Somos_, Apr 26 2015 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = my(A); if( n<1, n==-1, n++; A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x + A) * eta(x^2 + A) / (eta(x^9 + A) * eta(x^18 + A)), n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Mar 17 2004 */
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 27 2000
